cyclone.name: HANNA
cyclone.current_location: about 530 miles ESE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the north-western Gulf toward the central Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast, near Port O'Connor–Corpus Christi area

weather_observation.watch_coast: Port Mansfield to High Island, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Much of the Texas coast from Port Mansfield through High Island, including Galveston Bay
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds (39–45 mph) possible Friday night into Saturday with higher gusts
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge of 1–3 ft possible along the upper Texas coast and in Galveston Bay
weather_observation.rainfall: 2–4 inches of rain with isolated totals to 6 inches possible
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents affecting marine operations
